overview:
DABC, a Chennai based leading promoter/developer of residential complexes in chennai builder dabc with an expertise of above 2 decades and have transformed 46 Acres of land into a nice residential regiment in Mogappair, Chennaiâ€™s fastest growing suburb. DABC have so far, constructed 4.5 million sqft of built up area in the last 4 years and had been consistently delivering 400-500 flats every year. DABC successfully completed approximately 4800 flats and have 9000 satisfied customers to its credit and recently delivered 650 flats in the year 2009-2010. DABC is known for their promptness in delivery of flats & transparency in costing.

DABC with its renowned knowledge for identifying the best locations in and around fast-developing Chennai have now proposed a township namely â€œArboretumâ€ located in Mambakkam/Polachery village off OMR where it is projected above 9000 flats to be completed in a phased manner where they have already commenced 3 projects namely â€œAcaciaâ€, â€œBegoniaâ€ & â€œOrchidâ€. DABC is known for their prompt delivery as they have successfully handed over 46 projects before the agreed time.

The projects of DABC are approved by the leading Financial Institutions such as SBI, HDFC, LIC, BOB, IDBI, AXIS, GIC, ICICI, Dawan Housing etc., for funding their customers. Hence, there will not be any legal complications on their title. They deliver quality homes at a reasonable price.

DABC have contributed for the development of the Nolambur area. They have converted roughly around 50 acres into a residential regiment where about 25000 people leave happily. Some of their projects are like a model township. Their projects are designed to upkeep with all modern facilities and do not torment the inmates with costly maintenance utilites. They are known for the promptness in delivery. DABC is a pioneer in the construction industry having various luxurious projects in one of the most happening metros in India that is Chennai. The dream to buy a hassle-free home from a renowned company such as DABC (De-Luxe Apartments & Building Co.) has always been an major lifetime ambition for most people and DABC Chennai has always been closely associated in making a dream come true by giving the utmost care, thoroughly and meticulously looking into each and every project till the end, which itself will portray the excellence in construction industry with superior class construction along with detailed planning.

This company was created during 1992 with an aim for complete customer satisfaction which has been shown in the success of various projects constructed in Chennai. DABC relies on true high class professionalism which has created the way for its success which has been an essential part right from its foundation. All our projects speak volumes about the company in respect to the construction quality of high distinction. DABC CHENNAI always believe in creating projects that are way ahead of the expected customer standards with utmost quality control while keeping in mind the principles of basic constructions like natural light, sufficient ventilation around the house, etc.,

The new project of DABC, Abhinayam Phase III in Chennai will never compromise the surrounding beauty of the area. People who believe in the right investment with all comforts will find this wonderful set of apartments a worthy place both monetary as well as lifestyle too, which has always been a key factor for DABC.

Located in the heart of Moggapair with access to various amenities like schools, bus terminus, hospitals, etc., Abhinayam has various luxurious amenities that meets the daily routine activities like a gym, a beautiful spacious library, a well maintained park for children, a in store groceries and provision department, a day care centre for toddlers which is very helpful for working mothers, a laundry service, an office room, a large green garden with a good number of outdoor, seating, a rest room as well as a changing room for drivers and staff, a long track for jogging or walking, lifts, sewage as well as water treatment plants, CCTV, open and covered car parking with costs varying accordingly and most importantly a backup generator during power cuts.

The basic structure of Abhinayam phase III constructed with concrete or brick blocks which is plastered with smooth masonry walls and finally painted with cement. The flooring is ceramic at a cost of Rs.26 per sq.ft which is the basic price. The unique features of joinery are the teak finished flush main doors with teakwood frame and commercial flush shutters for inner doors attached with country wooden frames. Windows comes in steel material with M S grills and also glass shutters tightened with pin heads. Kitchens are constructed to a high standard providing granite platforms with a Carysil sink or an equivalent one. Glazed tiles are fitted in toilets up to a height of 7 feet and up to a height of 2 feet above the kitchen floors. Another feature to be mentioned is the provision of wardrobes in bedrooms.

The project is in progress and is expected to complete in 2012-13.

About DABC Chennai

DABC was founded by Jenix Dev Singh in 1992. There are more than 4000 residential flats with nearly 46 residential as well as commercial projects under the DABC Chennai belt which has been talk of the town while being located in and around the posh Anna Nagar as well as around Moggapair. The company today has a turnover of 100 Crore.

Enjoy the luxury of living with all comfort at Abhinayam Phase III - The place with no compromise. http://www.dabcchennai.com

Primary Media Contact : Jenix Dev Singh, dabc@airtelmail.in, 91-44-42382271
